instructions: On your iOS or iPadOS device, go to Settings > [ your name ] > iCloud > Manage Storage > Backups. Tap the name of your device, then, under Choose Data to Back Up, turn Backup on or off for each app. The amount of iCloud storage used by each app is shown below each of your listed apps. The apps list may be shortened. Tap Show All Apps to see a complete list. Some Apple apps back up data in iCloud but are not included in the list of apps. You can only turn off backup for listed apps.
